name: TDC Group
goal: TDC is a full scale telecommunications provider operating fixed, mobile and CATV networks, in Denmark. TDC also provides servcies for business and residential users in Norway under the 'Get' and 'TDC Norway' brands.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market
